_source.short_desc: Intelligent finance platform that aligns strategic financial and operational planning, budgeting, forecasting, and complex reporting.
_source.long_desc: OneStream is a modernized corporate performance management solution that simplifies financial consolidation and reporting, planning, budgeting and forecasting, analysis and data quality all with-in a single unified platform. Gain a single lens view into financial and operating results with in-system reporting, analysis, Microsoft Excel and Office integration. Reduce the time effort and cost to deliver timely and accurate information and new analysis as your business changes.
_source.pricing_details: Contact OneStream for pricing information or a quote.
_source.target_audience: Upper mid-market to the largest enterprise-class customer with the consolidation of financial planning & reporting complexities.

related_products.short_desc: The leading accounting software for small businesses. Instant access to customer, vendor and employee information.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Enterprise (Save Up to 40%) is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business. It provides all the tools your business needs, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage inventory, track sales, and even run payroll, but at the fraction of the cost. With QuickBooks Enterprise, you save thousands of dollars a year vs. comparable solutions. Powerful and flexible, it also comes in editions designed to fit your specific needs. Take a free test drive today.

related_products.short_desc: Tailor smart financial reports and budgets to suit your business with Xero. Accessible anytime, anywhere.  Take your free trial now!
related_products.features: Know your numbers with Xero financial reports. Track how specific areas of your business are performing. You decide what to track ? it could be departments, regions, rental properties or sales staff. You can use lock dates to close off your accounts at the end of reporting periods such as tax time and the end of financial year. You can export reports as a PDF, or export data to a spreadsheet with the formatting and formulas kept intact.

related_products.short_desc: Accounting tool that provides multi-monitor support and past due stamps through improved cash flow.
related_products.features: Accounting tool that provides multi-monitor support and past due stamps through improved cash flow.

related_products.short_desc: With NetSuite financial reports, gain a more complete picture of your business and generate accurate financial statements.
related_products.features: NetSuite's financial reports provide real-time insights into company performance for improved decision-making.  Generate accurate financial statements and reports that comply with US GAAP, IFRS, and other accounting standards. Multidimensional analysis provides unique insights that help finance and accounting teams get a comprehensive view of the business.  Multi-entity and multi-book accounting capabilities, combined with real-time data, make consolidating and reporting financial details easy.

related_products.short_desc: With NetSuite financial reports, gain a more complete picture of your business and generate accurate financial statements.

Multidimensional analysis provides unique insights that help finance and accounting teams get a comprehensive view of the business.  Multi-entity and multi-book accounting capabilities, combined with real-time data, make consolidating and reporting financial details easy.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online Advanced (Save 50%) is a cloud-based, all-in-one, accounting and business hub solution, designed for growing, small to mid-sized businesses. Get performance reporting with highly customizable tracking tools, automated workflows, and real-time revenue and cash flow management dashboards. Seamlessly integrate best-in-class Premium Apps like Salesforce and HubSpot (CRM), Bill.com (accounts payable), DocuSign, LeanLaw & more to expand your capabilities as your business needs grow.

related_products.short_desc: Construction and real estate management solution that pulls everything together for streamlined, single-source control.
related_products.features: Provides construction and real estate firms with the most complete solution for managing the entire project or property lifecycle with confidence, precision, and efficiency. Formerly Sage Timberline Office.

related_products.short_desc: Simple, easy-to-use accounting software to help you manage your business finance in a smart way!
related_products.features: Zoho Books generates a comprehensive list of financial reports such as profit & loss reports, cash flow statements, tax statements, balance sheet, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Save over 40+ hours per month on financial reporting and achieve real-time visibility into business performance.
related_products.features: With all your financial and operational data in one place, Sage Intacct's best-in-class multi-dimensional visibility of your income statements, balance sheet, or your statement of cash flow and more, enables you to slash time spent checking the accuracy of your financial data so you can start making strategic decisions that will impact your business. Reach peak performance with fast answers for confident decision-making.

related_products.short_desc: Fast receipt scanning and easy expense reporting on the go or in the office. Don't settle for standard. Itemize.
related_products.features:
Transforming receipts into intelligent data

Itemize is an Artificial Intelligence platform that extracts data from receipts, invoices, and other commerce documents. The engine delivers intelligence that automates expense management, enhances accounts payable workflows, and improves compliance functions.

related_products.short_desc: Complete, out-of-the-box-desktop accounting software, with secure cloud and mobile access, for small & medium sized businesses.
related_products.features: Sage 50cloud Accounting (formerly Peachtree Software) is a comprehensive accounting solution for small business. Designed for security, compliance and cloud-connected productivity. Popular features include detailed profitability tracking, cash flow forecasting, customized reporting via Microsoft Excel, advanced inventory tracking and automated bank reconciliation.

similar_products.short_desc: DataRails is the FP&A solution for Excel users.
similar_products.features: SMEs (50-2000 employees) can automate financial reporting processes with DataRails. Period-end reporting is easier when conducted using system functions within your familiar Excel spreadsheets. Don't worry about copy/pasting information or managing VLOOKUPs. Instead, automatically & seamlessly populate your monthly data and export it to your financials. DataRails centralizes all your financial statements and allows you to create organized and automated monthly reporting packages.

similar_products.short_desc: Windward is a low-code, embedded document solution for Microsoft Office users who want to streamline the creation and output of bulk do
similar_products.features: Windward Studios is a global leader in document generation software for the Financial Services industry. This low-code solution provides skilled users with the power to streamline tedious forms, statements, and reports with custom, professional-looking templates in Microsoft Office that connect directly to the data for a fast, error-free output.

similar_products.short_desc: Cube's financial reporting software automatically syncs data from your tech stack to your spreadsheets so you can work faster.
similar_products.features: Cube is the financial reporting software that automatically syncs source data from your tech stack to your spreadsheets. Optimize your financial reporting workflows in Excel and Google Sheets by reducing manual data transfers and the risk of human error. Finance professionals who use Cube can tell the story behind the numbers faster than ever. Cube pairs the flexibility and familiarity of your spreadsheet with the control and scale of performance software.

similar_products.short_desc: With NetSuite financial reports, gain a more complete picture of your business and generate accurate financial statements.
similar_products.features: NetSuite's financial reports provide real-time insights into company performance for improved decision-making.  Generate accurate financial statements and reports that comply with US GAAP, IFRS, and other accounting standards. Multidimensional analysis provides unique insights that help finance and accounting teams get a comprehensive view of the business.  Multi-entity and multi-book accounting capabilities, combined with real-time data, make consolidating and reporting financial details easy.

similar_products.short_desc: Connect source systems with existing spreadsheets for real-time insights. Compare with leading FP&A tools at a fraction of the price.
similar_products.features: OnPlan's fast and flexible FP&A platform makes financial reporting easy, connecting source systems with existing Google Sheets or Excel spreadsheets to generate visual, meaningful reports instantly. The financial reporting package integrates with other bundles and apps to create income statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements with ease. With powerful integrations and collaboration features, working across the org is a snap. Give your financial reports superpowers with OnPlan.

similar_products.short_desc: With Subscript, finance leaders can strategically guide their businesses by uncovering insights hidden in their subscription metrics.
similar_products.features:
With Subscript, finance leaders can strategically guide their businesses by uncovering insights hidden in their subscription metrics.

You'll have all of your B2B SaaS metrics available instantly and accurately in a robust platform, and you'll be able to slice and dice those metrics by any attribute you can imagine.

Want to see NDR by customer segment? 3 clicks.

Want to know which customer segments are most likely to upsell? 3 clicks.

You can finally wave goodbye to your ARR spreadsheet.

similar_products.short_desc: Centime Cash Flow Control integrates with your General Ledger and bank accounts to help you control and manage cash flow.
similar_products.features: Centime connects directly to your General Ledger and provides an accurate and holistic snapshot of your cash - both today and into the future. Manage AR and AP directly through Centime, and create forecasts that help you visualize the effects of variables from late customer payments to the effect of your AP decisions on your cash flow months down the road. Take control of your finances with Centimes' cloud-based cash flow management solution.

similar_products.short_desc: Build your dream dashboard: Connect to any source of financial data to see the metrics that matter most to you.
similar_products.features: With Domo, you can bring all your financial data sources together-from risk management tools like MISys to accounting software like QuickBooks-and transform it into easy-to-understand visualizations to simplify analysis for everyone from branch managers to board members.

similar_products.short_desc: Save over 40+ hours per month on financial reporting and achieve real-time visibility into business performance.
similar_products.features: With all your financial and operational data in one place, Sage Intacct's best-in-class multi-dimensional visibility of your income statements, balance sheet, or your statement of cash flow and more, enables you to slash time spent checking the accuracy of your financial data so you can start making strategic decisions that will impact your business. Reach peak performance with fast answers for confident decision-making.

similar_products.short_desc: Discover SAP S/4HANA Cloud, a complete ERP system with embedded AI and machine learning.
similar_products.features: SAP S/4HANA Cloud is a complete enterprise resource planning (ERP) system with built-in intelligent technologies, including AI, machine learning, and advanced analytics. It helps companies adopt new business models, manage business change at speed, orchestrate internal and external resources, and use the predictive power of AI. Benefit from tight, native integration between processes, industry depth, and a consistent in-memory data model.

similar_products.short_desc: Jedox is the world's most adaptable planning and performance management platform for integrated business planning.
similar_products.features: Jedox is the world's most adaptable planning and performance management platform that empowers organizations to deliver plans that outperform expectations. From FP&A to broader integrated business planning, model any scenario, integrate data from any source and simplify cross-organizational plans across all business systems. Jedox enables a culture of decisiveness and confidence so teams can plan for opportunities, react quickly to changes, and uncover what they didn't know was possible.

similar_products.short_desc: Trovata makes it easy to automate cash reporting & forecasting by providing a unified view of your cash across all your bank accounts.
similar_products.features: Trovata makes it easy for businesses to automate cash reporting, forecasting, analysis, and money movement. By bridging the gap between banks and accounting systems, Trovata helps companies gain powerful insights into their cash flows and facilitate better and quicker business decisions. As a next-gen technology platform, Trovata is helping many of the world's largest financial institutions digitally transform commercial and corporate banking with its growing network of direct API integrations.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting software automates an organization's financial functions and transactions with modules including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, billing and general ledger. Integration of Accounting applications allows for comprehensive, real-time, on-demand analysis of an organization's financial status. Toolsets within Accounting solutions can often be customized to the specific needs of an organization. Accounting software is related to Audit software, Billing and Invoicing software, Compliance software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting Practice Management software helps professional accountants manage workflow, communicate with their clients, and automate their daily processes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Audit software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Audit tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Audit software automates the process of preparing and executing audits by helping organizations analyze data, assess risks, track issues, report results, and manage paperwork. Audit software is related to Compliance software, Financial Reporting software and Financial Risk Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Budgeting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Budgeting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Budgeting software automates the coordination of an organization's financial resources and expenditures. Budgeting solutions allow for timely and accurate data management and analysis in order to give an overall picture of a business' growth and profitability. Multiple users across various departments can contribute their projected expenses and revenues to the organization's budgeting system, providing an automated budget approval process. Budgeting software is related to Accounting software, Business Performance Management software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Performance Management software provides organizations with the data they need to make decisions that are in line with company strategy. Business Performance Management solutions link performance measurements (key performance indicators, or KPIs) with strategic planning goals. The forecasting ability of these applications helps organizations analyze their actions and take corrective measures to meet performance goals. Business Performance Management software is related to Budgeting software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Compliance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Compliance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Compliance software enables an organization to monitor internal controls to ensure that standards and regulations are met. Compliance solutions that focus on financial and accounting compliance standards, such as the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, help organizations streamline financial documentation, audit trails, and reporting. Compliance solutions that focus on environmental compliance standards help organizations monitor and report on emissions, hazmat procedures, and regulatory policies. Compliance software is related to Accounting software, and EHS Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reporting software applications allow real-time access to essential data as well as the rapid generation of multidimensional reports from diverse data sources. Among many other uses, Reporting software can generate financial statements, track the success of sales strategies, monitor responsiveness to regulatory compliance concerns and manage internal controls or security audits. Reporting software is related to Business Intelligence software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Tax software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Tax tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Tax software manages the calculation, collection, and reporting of state and local taxes on sales of goods and services while maintaining compliance with various local and federal regulations.

_source.short_desc: An intelligent finance CPM platform that provides agility for operational planning and control for corporate financial reporting.
_source.long_desc: An enterprise market-leading intelligent CPM platform that aligns and simplifies financial consolidation, planning, reporting, analytics, and financial data quality for sophisticated organizations. OneStream? enables organizations to modernize finance, replace multiple legacy applications, and reduce the total cost of ownership of financial systems. Spend less time on data integration and system maintenance and more time focusing on driving business agility.
_source.pricing_details: Contact OneStream for pricing information or a quote.
_source.target_audience: Upper mid-market to the largest enterprise-class customer with the consolidation of financial planning & reporting complexities.

category_features.definition: Set a time to generate routine reports automatically

category_features.definition: Graphing and outlining possibilities of different scenarios and performance, 'what if' anaysis, yield analysis, cash flow projections

category_features.definition: Identifying desired outcomes and important milestones and creating a plan on how to achieve them

category_features.definition: Outline potential variations of future development and identify risks and opportunities within each

category_features.name: Scorecards
category_features.definition: Capture statistical records to measure achievements or progress towards  a particular goal.

related_products.short_desc: From payments to credit to fraud protection, PayPal Commerce Platform helps you meet your customers where they are.
related_products.features: The better you know your customers, the smarter you can sell. That's good for both you and your customers. Now you can use shopper insights to optimize operations and improve marketing with customizable retargeting capabilities.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why Asana is a top performer on Capterra.
related_products.features: Asana helps teams orchestrate their work-from daily tasks to strategic cross-functional initiatives. With Asana, teams are more confident, move faster, and accomplish more with less-no matter where they are located. More than 119,000 paying customers and millions of free organizations across 190 countries rely on Asana to manage everything from company objectives to digital transformation to product launches and marketing campaigns.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Tableau Software helps people see and understand data. Tableau delivers fast analytics, visualization and business intelligence.
related_products.features: Tableau helps people transform data into actionable insights that make an impact. Easily connect to data stored anywhere, in any format. Quickly perform ad hoc analyses that reveal hidden opportunities. Drag and drop to create interactive dashboards with advanced visual analytics. Then share your work with anyone and make an impact on your business. From global enterprises to early-stage startups and small businesses, people everywhere use Tableau to see and understand their data.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based human resources solution that helps businesses streamline workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes.
related_products.features: Workday HCM is a single, cloud-based solution for workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes. The solution is used by Fortune 500 and G2k companies to operate with agility and efficiency, and for organizations to be ready for whatever comes next. Unlike rigid HR systems or point solutions, Workday HCM delivers a skills-based HCM foundation and continuously innovates to enable customer success as the impact of technology, alternative work arrangements, and employee expectations evolve.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online Advanced (Save 50%) is a cloud-based, all-in-one, accounting and business hub solution, designed for growing, small to mid-sized businesses. Get performance reporting with highly customizable tracking tools, automated workflows, and real-time revenue and cash flow management dashboards. Seamlessly integrate best-in-class Premium Apps like Salesforce and HubSpot (CRM), Bill.com (accounts payable), DocuSign, LeanLaw & more to expand your capabilities as your business needs grow.

related_products.short_desc:
Workforce Analytics for the Modern ?Workplace
Understand how your team works - from everywhere! Empower your people, hone healthy work
related_products.features: ActivTrak's workforce analytics provide predictive insights that help leaders, managers, and employees build trust, deepen engagement and boost productivity in the modern, hybrid workplace. This work is supported by the ActivTrak Productivity Lab, a global center for ground-breaking research and expertise that leverages data sourced from more than 9,000 customers and over 550,000 users.

related_products.short_desc: Sisense is a self-service analytics and reporting tool that lets anyone create interactive dashboards & reports in minutes.
related_products.features: Sisense democratizes end-user reports so that every end-user receives access to the data and valuable insights that govern their business. Use the reporting software with special features to customize BI report content, control distribution lists of the report, apply filters to relevant information in certain groups, and play with the format. The final output is a report that is destined to the right audience and targeted with the correct info that makes decision making data-driven

related_products.short_desc: Sage 100cloud is an ERP platform for growing and medium-sized distributors and manufacturers.
related_products.features: With more than 30 years as a market-leader, Sage 100cloud is among the most stable and feature-rich business management solutions for mid-sized manufacturers, distributors, and service businesses today. Built for security and compliance, Sage 100cloud is a trusted solution for managing complexities associated with growth. Thanks to its business objects framework, Web APIs, and Office 365 connectivity, Sage 100cloud can be easily customized to meet the unique needs of businesses.

similar_products.short_desc: Cube's reporting platform automatically syncs data from your tech stack to your spreadsheets so you can plan better and faster.
similar_products.features: Cube is the reporting software that automatically syncs source data from your tech stack to your spreadsheets. Optimize your reporting workflows in Excel and Google Sheets by reducing manual data transfers and the risk of human error. Finance professionals who use Cube can tell the story behind the numbers faster than ever. Cube pairs the flexibility and familiarity of your spreadsheet with the control and scale of performance software.

similar_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence tool that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data.
similar_products.features: A self-service business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights on your business information. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports in minutes with no IT help. Data can be imported from applications and databases, even behind firewalls. Zoho Analytics also includes Zoho DataPrep which connect, model, cleanse, transform, and enrich data for analytics.

similar_products.short_desc: Windward Core is the global leader in embedded document generation solutions, allowing users to create any kind of document imaginable.
similar_products.features: Windward Core is the global leader in document generation solutions. Core embeds into applications with only 11 lines of code. It enables users to design templates using business logic and multiple data sources within the familiar landscape of Microsoft Office. Core is fast, easy, and removes human error, transforming the way business professionals create documents. ISVs and OEMs can quickly take their custom solutions with powerful reporting capabilities to the market by integrating with Core.

similar_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
similar_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

similar_products.short_desc: Whether you're a BI analyst or developer, people rely on you to turn raw data into powerful insights.
similar_products.features: Domo delivers the world's first cloud-based business intelligence and reporting platform, which gives executives across an organization the ability to make faster and better-informed decisions. Domo is the first solution that brings together seven products into one elegant platform enabling users to connect, prepare, visualize, engage and optimize their business around data.

similar_products.short_desc: Exchange Reporter Plus is a web-based hybrid Exchange reporting, auditing, monitoring, and content search solution.
similar_products.features: Exchange Reporter Plus is a web-based tool used to report on, audit, monitor and perform content search in Exchange Server, Exchange Online and Skype for Business. It features over 450 comprehensive reports on various Exchange objects, such as mailboxes, public folders, and distribution lists.  The tool audits granular changes and monitors the server and services 24x7. Alerts in Exchange Reporter Plus give instant notifications on critical events that require your attention.

similar_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why Asana is a top performer on Capterra.
similar_products.features: Asana helps teams orchestrate their work-from daily tasks to strategic cross-functional initiatives. With Asana, teams are more confident, move faster, and accomplish more with less-no matter where they are located. More than 119,000 paying customers and millions of free organizations across 190 countries rely on Asana to manage everything from company objectives to digital transformation to product launches and marketing campaigns.

similar_products.short_desc: Passport Software's IRS-certified ACA Software helps manage and report ACA data  to help you avoid IRS penalties.
similar_products.features:
Passport Software's reporting  and compliance management software reporting identifies full-time employees and tracks part-time employees trending towards full-time. You can  track employees adding coverage, changing statuses, contributions, affordability rates and more. 
It helps to streamline year end reporting and provides much more than just forms. 
Accommodates most payroll and ERP systems.

similar_products.short_desc: Dundas BI is a flexible, embeddable BI, reporting and data analytics platform. Everything you need is in one end-to-end tool.
similar_products.features: Dundas BI is a BI, data visualization and analytics platform for Software Vendors and enterprise organizations. Our fully customizable BI platform gives you instant access to real-time data and information from across your organization, so you can transform it into interactive dashboards and reports for faster insight into your entire business. Dundas BI  was designed to be embedded into your existing systems and applications for a great user experience. Free trial or live demo available.

similar_products.product_name: PBRS for Power BI (Power BI Reports Scheduler)
similar_products.short_desc: SSRS & Power BI Reports Scheduler: Send Data Driven SSRS & Power BI Dashboards & Reports To Unlimited Users
similar_products.features: PBRS saves time and money by making it easy to automate the distribution & delivery of SSRS & Power BI Reports & Dashboards. Simply define single or packages of Power BI reports, schedule, run them automatically, and send the reports to print, fax, folder, FTP, SMS, Dropbox, SharePoint & email in a number of standard formats including Excel, Word, PDF, HTML and more. Date & Time Scheduling, Event-Triggers, Dynamic & Data Driven Automation, Pre & Post Delivery Workflows.

similar_products.short_desc: Yellowfin is the only analytics suite that successfully combines action based dashboards with industry-leading automated analysis.
similar_products.features: Reports and dashboards that not only drive action, but allow you take action without ever leaving Yellowfin. Yellowfin reporting allows you to custom code actions right on the dashboard that call on APIs, design anything with a pixel perfect canvas, and query the data with AI with just a click. Bring your users & workflows to the dashboard for seamless data decision making.

similar_products.short_desc: Paladin's Powerfully Simple and Proven Point of Sale and Inventory Management software helps independent retail businesses run better.
similar_products.features:
Paladin Point of Sale and Inventory Management

For over 40 years, Paladin Data Corp. has been helping independent retail businesses run better. The hybrid retail system automates ordering, tracks inventory and provides detailed reports along with hundreds of integrations to enable the tools you need to succeed in managing your business more efficiently.

Learn more about Paladin's intuitive interface, easy set-up process, low monthly payments (no long-term contracts) and highly rated support.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to use Financial, Operational and BI Reporting solution with focus on ERP Applications like Oracle Cloud ERP, EBS, NetSuite ..etc
similar_products.features: Easy to use Financial, Operational and BI Reporting solution that enables end users to develop their own analytics. Offering pre-built integration with several common ERP and Cloud applications such as Oracle Cloud ERP, Oracle E-Business Suite, PeopleSoft, Taleo, NetSuite and Salesforce. Orbit is a superior reporting platform for enterprise data from any application, any data source, and on any device.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Performance Management software provides organizations with the data they need to make decisions that are in line with company strategy. Business Performance Management solutions link performance measurements (key performance indicators, or KPIs) with strategic planning goals. The forecasting ability of these applications helps organizations analyze their actions and take corrective measures to meet performance goals. Business Performance Management software is related to Budgeting software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Visualization software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Visualization tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Visualization software helps companies present information in an organized, graphical and easily searchable manner. This type of software is designed to integrate with existing applications and use data to build visual presentations. For related software solutions see Business Intelligence software, Knowledge Management software and Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Embedded Analytics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Embedded Analytics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Embedded Analytics software allows users to integrate analytical capabilities with the applications they already use and access analytical tools from within these applications.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Financial Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Financial Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Financial Reporting software automates the task of reporting an organization's financial results, status and transactions. Financial Reporting applications help organizations control and increase operational efficiencies. These solutions provide the ability to collect, translate and consolidate data from various systems and geographic locations. Financial Reporting software is related to Accounting software, Budgeting software, Business Performance Management software and Compliance software.
